column3: Assertion - No text - Type=variation to disease

column5: ObservedData.Attribute - In an English patient with gyrate atrophy of the choroid and retina (GACR; 258870), Brody et al. (1992) identified 2 mutations on the same allele of the OAT gene: one was a C-to-T transition at nucleotide 1250, resulting in a pro417-to-leu substitution (613349.0012), and the other was a leu437-to-phe (L437F; 613349.0013) substitution. Brody et al. (1992) suggested that L437F is neutral and in linkage disequilibrium with the pathologic P417L mutation. - Type=Description

column6: Citation.ID - 1737786 - Source=PubMed
